remarks: The "section" image of an entourage at a point ` P ` always contains a ball (centered on this point).  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2017.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
metustblOLD $p |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ V e. ( metUnifOLD ` D ) /\ P e. X ) -> E. a e. ran ( ball ` D ) ( P e. a /\ a C_ ( V " { P } ) ) ) $.
$d D a $.
$d P a $.
$d V a $.
$d X a $.
